::KitKat::

she watched as the base blew up. She sighed and looked at 
Obsidian,"yes, all made it out safely. Now lets get a move on it and 
get everyone to the new base."

(Where is the new base located, geogaphically?)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Obsidian/Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::Once they see that the base was destroyed, they fly back down.  
they look 
> to KitKat::
> Obsidian: Did everyone get out safely?
